products.name: Wazi as a service VSI on VPC Landing zone
products.short_description: Creates a secure infrastructure with virtual servers to run your workloads on a VPC network
products.long_description: The VSI on VPC landing zone provides secure and customizable compute resources for running your applications and services. It creates secure and compliant Virtual Server Instances (VSI) on top of an existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) network.
